title: Woman Slapping Immigration Officer In Bali Not Indian
subtitle: The video is of a Pakistan born UK citizen who was detained in Bali for overstaying her visa by 160 days
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Lady from India sentenced to three years in jail for slapping an immigration officer in Bali, Indonesia. She lost her cool because she missed her flight. Since she assaulted a government official on duty even her bail has been rejected. She now has three years in jail to cool down her temper.

The woman in the video, identified as Auj-E-Taqqadas, is a British national of Pakistani origin. BOOM had debunked the same video when it was viral last year with a similar narrative. Taqqadas, who was headed to Singapore, was detained, for overstaying her visa by 160 days. The video shows an angry and abusive Taqqadas shouting at the immigration officer.
